bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of lou 瘺 , fistula, with many small swellings that appear strung together mostly around one’s neck. In severe cases they cover the entire body. In former times it was believed that this disease results from inadvertently ingesting poisonous semen of ants. Hence for treatment a medication was prepared from animals known to overcome ants. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry ling li jia 鯪鯉甲：燒之作灰，以 酒或水和方寸匕，療蟻瘺 , “Burn to ashes and mix with wine or water. One square inch size spoon will heal ant fistula ”.
